headline: FORD BOSS LISA BRANKIN 🚗⚡ SLAMMING THE BRAKES 😤🛑 on EV TAX HIKES 💸🚫 – 'NOT NOW, QUEEN REEVES 👑📉, DEMAND'S ALREADY FLATLINING 😩💨!'
text:
UH-OH⁉️💢 FORD UK MOMMY LISA BRANKIN 👩‍💼🚀 dropping BOMBS 💣📢 on CHANCELLOR RACHEL REEVES 👸💰: 'Now's NOT the VIBE 🕶️🚫 to SLAP TAXES 💸😡 on ELECTRIC BADDIES ⚡🚗 when DEMAND's LOST its MOJO 😩📉 – it's STALLED harder than a Ford Focus on its LAST LEGS 🏁💀!' BBC spilling the TEA ☕📰 that Reeves might DROP pay-per-MILE LEVIES 📏💸 from 2028, but Brankin’s like 'HELL NAH 🙅‍♀️🚫, that's just ANOTHER BRAKE 🛑🍆 on fragile EV HYPE!' Admin NIGHTMARE 😵‍💫📱 of tracking mileage? TOTAL BUZZKILL 💤🚫 for switcheroo seekers! 'Easy PEASY 🍌😏 selling what peeps WANT 🔥, but PUSHING UNWANTED ZAPPERS ⚡😤? GOOD LUCK 🍀🤡!' Ford's PUMA 🐆🚗 is UK's TOP CAT 🥇😻, TRANSIT VAN 🛵💨 #2 HAULER, but FOCUS 🚗🔚 got AXED 🪓😢 – last one rolled off GERMANY lines LAST WEEK 🏭🇩🇪💥! 6K UK JOBS 🏭👷‍♂️ at DAGENHAM DIESEL DADDY 🏭⛽ (Europe's OG BEHEMOTH 🦖) and HALWOOD TRANS 🧩 – no CARS built here since 2013 😭📅, but NET ZERO NET-ZEROing 😤🌍 with 80% EV SALES by 2030 or FINES 🍑💸 incoming!

TREASURY SIMPS 🤡📜 whining 'FUEL DUTY for GAS GULPERS ⛽🚗, but EV TESLA WANNABES ⚡😏 get FREE RIDE? UNFAIR AF ⚖️😠!' Brankin ROASTING 🔥: MARKET's DISTORTED AF 🤪📉 with HEAVY DISCOUNTS 💸🔥 and SHITTY RESALE VALUES 📉🍑 on used ZAPS ⚡🏪 – demand went from BUOYANT BUBBLE 🫧🚀 to FLAT TIRE 😩🛞! SMMT STATS 📊🔥: EVs at 22.4% new sales thru Oct 2025 (UP from 18.1% last year 📈😤), SEPTEMBER EV SURGE 💥⚡ best since 2020 – but BUSINESSES 🏢💼 gobbling 'em for CHEAP COMPANY CAR TAX 🤑📉 vs DIESEL DADDIES ⛽😤! Brankin BEGGING 👑🙏: KEEP that GREEN FLEET PERK 🌿🚛 or we're SCREWED 🔩😱! GOVT tossed back £3,750 GRANT 🎁💰 to JUICE sales ⚡🍑, cuz FORD can't HIT 80% without HANDOUTS 🤲😩 – 'CUSTO DEMAND ain't matching AMBITION 🚀📉, bby!'

DAGENHAM DIESEL DEN 🏭⛽ with 1,800 souls 👻🏭 pumping till 2030, but FUTURE? TBA 🤷‍♀️💭 – 'WORKING HARD 🏋️‍♀️🔧 on NEXT LIFE ✨, no DEETS yet!' Ford under PRESSURE 💥😰 like ELON'S CYBERTRUCK RAMP-UP 🚀🔩 to NET ZERO or BUST 💣🌍 – but TAXING NOW? That's like KICKING TESLA while it's DOWN 😤⚡🚫! Wall Street? NAH, this is UK CARMA 🎡🚗 – Brankin SLAYING the pod 💅🎙️: 'Don't BRAKE the MOMENTUM 🛑📉 when it's already WOBBLING 😵!' PUMA POWER 🐆💪 holding the FORT 🏰, but EV ORGY 💦⚡ needs LUBE not LEVIES 🛢️🚫! Reeves, take NOTES 📝😏 or Ford's gonna FOCUS on DRAGGING you 📉🐱! 😂🔥🚀
